amendment.description: Amendment repeals restrictions on the export of crude oil and includes provisions of HR 702 as passed by the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barton amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 255 - 168 (Roll no. 664).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barton amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 255 - 168 (Roll no. 664).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Barton.
